name: Lies In My Head
description:
I am a gameDev student and this is my first attempt to make a game by myself. I am NOT a coder, so I am saying a BIG THANK YOU to people who make tutorials! Bless you! You beautiful creatures!

I'm not here to win, merely to get an understanding about everything a game needs.

This jam was a boost for me to not stop and keep going. Thank you!
